ocrd-gbn-sbb-crop.description: Crops the input page images by predicting the actual page surface and setting the PAGE-XML Border accordingly

model.description: Path to Keras model to be used

shaping.description: How the images must be processed in order to match the input shape of the model ('resize' for resizing to model shape and 'split' for splitting into patches)

ocrd-gbn-sbb-binarize.description: Binarizes the input page images by predicting their foreground pixels and saving it as a PAGE-XML AlternativeImage

model.description: Path to Keras model to be used

shaping.description: How the images must be processed in order to match the input shape of the model ('resize' for resizing to model shape and 'split' for splitting into patches)

operation-level.description: Level of the PAGE-XML hierarchy to operate on

ocrd-gbn-sbb-segment-page.description: Segments the input page images by predicting the regions and setting the PAGE-XML Regions accordingly

model.description: Path to Keras model to be used for predicting regions

shaping.description: How the images must be processed in order to match the input shape of the model ('resize' for resizing to model shape and 'split' for splitting into patches)

classes.description: Dictionary specifying the classes (as PAGE-XML elements) to be considered and their respective labels

ocrd-gbn-sbb-segment-regions.description: Segments the input region images by predicting the text lines and setting the PAGE-XML TextLines accordingly

model.description: Path to Keras model to be used for predicting text lines

shaping.description: How the images must be processed in order to match the input shape of the model ('resize' for resizing to model shape and 'split' for splitting into patches)

classes.description: Dictionary specifying the classes (as PAGE-XML elements) to be considered and their respective labels
